programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Shell-shocked, the chefs crush open crustaceans in every round to make sensational seafood meals; big ambitions in a tight time frame might mean trouble for one chef, and the judges wonder if a risky plan in the dessert round will pan out.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: This battle is all about indulging wholeheartedly in late-night cravings; in the first round, tacos and ramen in the basket force the chefs to make fusion plates; the entrée basket includes a very hot pepper and a beloved potato product.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Four determined chefs may think that combining ramen with fruity cereal is their biggest challenge, but a serious injury leaves one competitor stunned; the chefs must deal with a strange frozen food and show their point of view with meaty desserts.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Four competitors return to the stoves after being hand-picked as favorites by judge Maneet Chauhan; the baskets that Maneet selects for this battle include a signature Nashville flavoring, an Indian dessert and a frozen cocktail.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Four champions return to the kitchen via personal invitation from judge Scott Conant; a notorious vegetable is a true test in the appetizer basket; in the second round, one chef hits a major hurdle when an ingredient falls to the floor.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Four champions return to the kitchen as favorites of judge Alex Guarnaschelli; in the first round, a French pastry and a flavored fish are two pieces of the culinary puzzle that Alex has devised for her special group of competitors.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Four returning chefs are put to the test by legendary judge Chris Santos for a chance to compete in the tournament finale with Chris as their sous chef; a beautiful ode to bacon is one of the ingredients in the appetizer basket designed by Chris.

programme.title: Chopped
